:::config { "language": "javascript", "theme": "night-owl" }
CustomRenderer.prototype.matchedRangeModifier = function (content, prefix = '') {
    let pattern = new RegExp(escapeRegex(prefix) + ':?((start|end|all|-?[0-9]+)(,-?[0-9]+)?)?', 'i');

    return content.match(pattern);
}
:::expectation
<pre><code data-theme='night-owl' data-lang='javascript' class='phiki language-javascript night-owl torchlight' style='background-color: #011627;color: #d6deeb;--theme-selection-background: #4373c2'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #4b6479; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: #d6deeb;">CustomRenderer</span><span class="token" style="color: #c792ea;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #7fdbca;">prototype</span><span class="token" style="color: #c792ea;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #82AAFF;">matchedRangeModifier</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #d6deeb;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #c792ea;">function</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #d9f5dd;">(</span><span class="token" style="color: #d7dbe0;">content</span><span class="token" style="color: #d6deeb;">,</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #d7dbe0;">prefix</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #d6deeb;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #d9f5dd;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #d9f5dd;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #d9f5dd;">)</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #d6deeb;">{</span><span class="token">
